name: nativescript-loadingindicator
description: NativeScript plugin to add custom loading indicators

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo ;cd demo ;tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo ;cd demo ;tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build ;cd demo ;tns plugin remove nativescript-loadingindicator ;tns plugin add .. ;tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo ;npm install ;cd .. ;npm run build ;cd demo ;tns plugin add .. ;cd ..
